Parameter.name: userRules
Parameter.value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><rules version="1.0"> <default colorSpace="ACES - ACES2065-1"/> <FilePathRule name="default" extension="*" pattern="*" colorSpace="Utility - Raw" /> <FilePathRule name="hdr2" extension="hdr" pattern="*" colorSpace="Utility - Linear - sRGB" /> <FilePathRule name="hdr" extension="*" pattern="*[hH][dD][rR]*" colorSpace="Utility - Linear - sRGB" /> <FilePathRule name="diffuse" extension="*" pattern="*[dD]iff*" colorSpace="Utility - sRGB - Texture" /> <FilePathRule name="color" extension="*" pattern="*[cC]olor*" colorSpace="Utility - sRGB - Texture" /> <FilePathRule name="basecolor" extension="*" pattern="*[bB]ase[cC]olor*" colorSpace="Utility - sRGB - Texture" /> <FilePathRule name="base" extension="*" pattern="*[bB]ase*" colorSpace="Utility - sRGB - Texture" /> <FilePathRule name="albedo" extension="*" pattern="*[aA]lbedo*" colorSpace="Utility - sRGB - Texture" /></rules>
